snippet: The girl sustained severe leg injuries and the accident reignited tensions between the city and transportation union officials over new traffic laws.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority bus driver Francisco DeJesus is arrested and charged with failure to yield after his bus strikes and severely injures 15-year-old girl in Brooklyn crosswalk.
lead_paragraph: The girl sustained severe leg injuries and the accident reignited tensions between the city and transportation union officials over new traffic laws.

headline.main: Teenager Pinned Under Bus in Brooklyn; Driver Charged
headline.print_headline: Teenager Pinned Under Bus; Driver Charged
